# 🧭 Our 5-Layer Epistemology

1. 🌊 Sea (Truth)
2. 🚢 Ship (Belief Systems)
3. 🏴‍☠️🪛 Pirate/Tinker (Critique)
4. 🦈✂️🛟 Shark/Scissors/Life-Raft (Discernment)
5. 🏝️ Island (Meaning)
